title: Your allies lost his inners!
body:
Your allies decorating the seabed!
Go take a sip from the fountain! 

You know if I spammed the sht this commentator did everytime someone on either team died over all chat I guarantee I'd get reported 80% of the time.

replies.body: your mate is feeding the fishes
Well yeah he does work in an Aquarium.
You'd get reported for saying: "double kill" "an ally has been slain" "an enemy has been slain" "ace" every time anyone died too, whats your point?
Are you bronze, low mmr or very low silver if yes you get reported for saying or doing anything.
he's the commentator though, he does it for both teams.
